about.title: 01. PROTOCOL ANALYSIS
about.bio1: Since stepping into the software world with Unity and C#, I focus on transforming complex systems into elegant solutions. My passion for creating not just games but living worlds has always pushed me towards deeper technical details.
about.bio2: Performance-oriented architectural structures and visually impressive shader works are my areas of expertise.

projects.title: 02. PROJECT ARCHIVE
projects.subtitle: Technical works pushing boundaries and creative gaming experiences.

cyber_drift.title: Cyber Drift
cyber_drift.desc: Raycast-based arcade racing system with custom drifting physics.

shadow_protocol.title: Shadow Protocol
shadow_protocol.desc: Co-op stealth game featuring dynamic lighting and AI vision systems.

vox_world.title: Vox World
vox_world.desc: Infinite voxel world generation using compute shaders.

node_graph.title: Node Graph
node_graph.desc: Visual scripting node editor built for custom dialogue systems.

post_fx.title: Post-FX Lite
post_fx.desc: Mobile-optimized post-processing stack for low-end devices.

build_automator.title: Build Automator
build_automator.desc: Automated build and deployment pipeline for multi-platform Unity projects.
